data.name: Warface – Desert Snake Pack
data.detailed_description:
This package contains the following items:


  • IMBEL IA2 + Desert Snake camo

  • Fabarm P.S.S.10 + Desert Snake camo

  • PP-19 Bizon + Desert Snake camo

  • M40A5 + Desert Snake camo

This pack offers primary weapons for all classes with realistic yet stylish "Desert Snake" camo. Make Mojave your ally and use the supreme firepower to the fullest!

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Assault rifle – IMBEL IA2. The original rifle was officially deployed in the Brazilian army as a replacement for the outdated FN FAL and M16A2 rifles. Its advantages include the universal STANAG magazine, high power and durability, good accuracy at long ranges and reliability in extreme conditions.

Shotgun - Fabarm P.S.S.10. Fabarm P.S.S.10 is a modern semi-automatic shotgun. It has an extremely high rate of fire, great accuracy and smooth recoil.

Submachine gun - PP-19 Bizon. Intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units as a weapon with fast and accurate fire at close range, the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs requested the development of this weapon from the son of the famous weapon developer Kalashnikov. The cylinder below the barrel is often confused as a grenade launcher, but is in fact a helical feed magazine.

Sniper rifle - M40A5. This heavy bolt-action sniper rifle is widely used by Marines because of its high power, long range and high-capacity magazine.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
